member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Tabs.TabItem.Header
member.summary: Required HTML content to show content of current TabItem.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Tabs.TabItem.Content
member.summary: Required HTML content to show Header content of current TabItem.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Tabs.TabItem.Disabled
member.summary: Determines whether all the rendered HTML elements should be disabled or not.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Tabs.TabsPanel.InnerElementReference
member.summary: Exposes a Blazor of the wrapped around HTML element. It can be used e.g. for JS interop, etc.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Tabs.TabsPanel.TabItems
member.summary: Required HTML content to set TabItems as .

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Tabs.TabsPanel.ActiveColor
member.summary: Sets the `style` of the `background-color` when tab is Active. Use HTML specified: **Color Names**, **RGB**, **HEX** or with **HSL** values.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Tabs.TabsPanel.InactiveColor
member.summary: Sets the `style` of the `background-color` when tab is not the Active tab. Use HTML specified: **Color Names**, **RGB**, **HEX** or with **HSL** values.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Tabs.TabsPanel.HoverColor
member.summary: Sets the `style` of the `background-color` when button is hovered over with mouse. Use HTML specified: **Color Names**, **RGB**, **HEX** or with **HSL** values.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Tabs.TabsPanel.Disabled
member.summary: Determines whether all the rendered HTML elements should be disabled or not.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Tabs.TabsPanel.TabCount
member.summary: Returns the number of int the given `TabsPanel`.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Tabs.TabsPanel.Tabs
member.summary: Returns all the reference added to the group. It can be used for activating any of the tabs.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Tabs.TabsPanel.ActiveTab
member.summary: Returns all the reference added to the group. It can be used for activating any of the elements.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Tabs.TabsPanel.OnTabChanged
member.summary: Callback function called when other tab activated. Active TabItem is the callback parameter.

member.name: P:Blazor.Components.Tabs.TabsPanel.AllOtherAttributes
member.summary: Blazor capture for any unmatched HTML attributes.
